guildID: THE ID OF YOUR HYPIXEL GUILD
adminPerm: You need `ADMINISTRATOR` permission to check server's configuration
notLinked:
This Discord account is not linked to any Minecraft account!


- To **link a Minecraft account**, type the command `/verify <your Minecraft username>`
‚ö†Ô∏è To be able to link your account:
> - Connect on **hypixel.net**
> - Click on your profile menu (Head in your inventory)
> - Go on __Social Media__ page
> - Click on the Discord Head and type your Discord TAG in the chat (Example: `ezzud` OR `ezzud#0001`)
